patterns: DAFI Scholarship Program
Tell me about DAFI Scholarship
Details about DAFI Scholarship
What is DAFI Scholarship?
How can I apply for DAFI Scholarship?
responses: DAFI Scholarship Program: Supports refugees to access higher education in their host countries. Eligibility: Refugees registered with UNHCR, with strong academic records. Application Period: Varies by country. More details

patterns: Windle Trust International
Tell me about Windle Trust Scholarship
Details about Windle Trust Scholarship
What is Windle Trust International?
How can I apply for Windle Trust Scholarship?
responses: Windle Trust International Scholarships: - Purpose: Provides education and training opportunities for refugees and the displaced - Eligibility: Refugees in East Africa, with a focus on those with limited means - Application Period: Typically announced annually. More details

patterns: UNHCR Higher Education Scholarships
Tell me about UNHCR Scholarships
Details about UNHCR Scholarships
What are UNHCR Scholarships?
How can I apply for UNHCR Scholarships?
responses: UNHCR Higher Education Scholarships: - Purpose: Provides scholarships for refugees to pursue higher education - Eligibility: Refugees registered with UNHCR, meeting academic criteria - Application Period: Varies by country and program.More details

patterns: University of the People Scholarships for Refugees
Tell me about University of the People Scholarships
Details about University of the People Scholarships
What is University of the People?
How can I apply for University of the People Scholarships?
responses: University of the People Scholarships for Refugees: - Purpose: Offers tuition-free, accredited degree programs online - Eligibility: Open to refugees worldwide, with a focus on those in need - Application Period: Rolling admissions throughout the year.More details

patterns: Erasmus Mundus Joint Master Degrees (EMJMD)
Tell me about Erasmus Mundus Scholarships
Details about Erasmus Mundus Scholarships
What is Erasmus Mundus?
How can I apply for Erasmus Mundus Scholarships?
responses: Erasmus Mundus Joint Master Degrees (EMJMD): - Purpose: Provides scholarships for high-level integrated international study programs - Eligibility: Students from all over the world, including refugees and asylum seekers - Application Period: Typically from October to January for courses starting the following academic year.More details

Tell me about WUSC Scholarships
Details about WUSC Scholarships
What is WUSC?
How can I apply for WUSC Scholarships?
responses: WUSC Student Refugee Program: - Purpose: Provides resettlement and educational opportunities for refugees - Eligibility: Refugees in countries of asylum, meeting academic and resettlement criteria - Application Period: Annually, with specific deadlines.More details
